title: 玩家不能使用tpa和warp命令
author: Dirito
txt_content:
如题，权限插件是luckperms
1.12catserver端
luckperms.user.*给了也没用

replies.author: 恋
replies.txt_content:
lp g default permission set essentials.tpa
lp g default permission set essentials.warp

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content: 试试用这个找到对应的权限 https://pluginscdtribe.github.io/wiki/luckperms/Verbose.html

replies.author: skyliye
replies.txt_content:

replies.author: Proudchen
replies.txt_content: 首先 确定是否使用的ESSX插件不是别的基础插件，如果是ESSX 就用LP权限组指令进行添加essentials.warp 、 essentials.tpa
